entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
